name: April Coloring
description:
Treat yourself with hundreds of paint-by-number kits hidden inside this relaxing and calming game full of art, positive energy and good memories.

Its features include smooth coloring, a plethora of high-detailed, quality content and a unique experience system allowing you to unlock more pictures as you progress.

Whether you’re looking to relax after a busy day at work, pass the time as you commute, or share some fun with your child, April is the perfect solution for you.

If you’ve ever enjoyed coloring, you will definitely fall in love with April!

Key Features:

+ 600 illustrations
+ Leveling system for unlocking new content
+ Social media sharing
+ Time-lapse after finished painting
+ Daily content
